data.title: Postcard from Mrs. H. Itaya to Claire D. Sprauge, May 25, 1942
data.meta_description:
Dear Mrs. Sprague,
I have received your card. There is a reception room at second gate east on [Charter] Way. We will be there at your appointed time.
Yours truly,
Mrs. H. Itaya 1942
Black 4 Barr. [barrack] 58
[ID] #55 Unit A
Mrs. Claire Sprague
1444 N. Baker St., [street]
Stockton, Calif. [California]
data.text:
Transcription

Dear Mrs. Sprague,

I have received your card. There is a reception room at second gate east on [Charter] Way. We will be there at your appointed time.

Yours truly,

Mrs. H. Itaya 1942

Black 4 Barr. [barrack] 58

[ID] #55 Unit A

Mrs. Claire Sprague

1444 N. Baker St., [street]

Stockton, Calif. [California]
